page.title: 16Railway Test Track.
page.content: British Rail have a test and development track based at Old Dalby. The track runs from Melton to Edwalton and the projects during the last year have been:- 1.A nuclear waste fuel flask used on the railways was tested by having a train crash into it at 100mph.The flask did not break.The test cost Â£1.5M.to set up. 2.Tests on radio communication between trains and a central control. 3.Tests on new types of 4-wheel bogies for London Underground. 4.Load measuring wheel tests on trucks 5.An opticlal measuring carriage. Signals are bounced off objects at the side of the track.A computer can measure how far the objects are from the side of the train.This will be used by the tilting high speed trains.
